original_text: Now Jonathan and Ahimaaz were waiting at En-rogel. A female servant was to go and tell them, and they were to go and tell King David, for they were not to be seen entering the city.
korean_text: 그 때에 요나단과 아히마아스가 사람이 볼까 두려워하여 감히 성에 들어가지 못하고 에느로겔 가에 머물고 어떤 여종은 그들에게 나와서 말하고 그들은 가서 다윗 왕에게 알리더니

sentences.original_text: Now Jonathan and Ahimaaz were waiting at En-rogel.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 요나단과 아히마아스는 엔로겔에서 기다리고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: A female servant was to go and tell them,
sentences.korean_translation: 한 여종이 가서 그들에게 알려야 했고,

sentences.original_text: and they were to go and tell King David,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다윗 왕에게 가서 알려야 했습니다,

sentences.original_text: for they were not to be seen entering the city.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 성에 들어가는 것이 보이지 않아야 했�� 때문입니다.
